translation.en: -What is this? -[footsteps boom]
Don't you know who I am?
-[man] I demand you open this gate! -[strumming pipa rapidly]
[teacher] Now, follow me.
Carefully, just like this.
Okay, raise your paper.
And with scales, some grass, some clouds.
Stupid teacher. [grumbles]
-Hi, Mom. -Hi, sweetie.
Hi, Dad.
There you are. Hungry? You want a snack? Hey, Dad.
translation.it: - Ciao! Hai fame? Vuoi uno snack? - Ehi, papà.

translation.en: -What'd you learn? -We learned about dragons.
-Your mom forgot you. She doesn't-- -Jimmy, stop. It's rude.
translation.it: - La tua mamma ti ha dimenticato. - Jimmy!

translation.en: You know it's only the two of them. She's trying her best.
translation.it: Sai che sono da soli. Lei fa del suo meglio.

translation.en: I'm Li Na.
I'm Din.
You can walk home with me.
My dad's always late.
translation.it: Mio padre è sempre in ritardo.

translation.en: -I'm gonna get you! -♪ See the world dancing in your eyes ♪
-Which one? -This one.
Fly, little Clucky!
I'll call you later.
No, no, you first got to multiply the top by the bottom.
-Come here, little monkey. Up! -[laughs] Bye, Din!
Hot!
-You're late! -I had to get the stuff!
All right, scales. Oh! Roller skates!
Ready, set, awesome dragon kite!
translation.it: Pronto, via! Il nostro drago aquilone!

translation.en: I guess it didn't work.
Let's make a promise to be best friends forever.
translation.it: Promettiamo di essere migliori amici per sempre.

translation.en: Friends forever…
[both] …year by year,
upon this we will always swear.
translation.it: lo giuriamo da qui in eterno.

translation.en: -Come on. It's time to go. -Dad, we said--
translation.it: - È ora di andare. - Ma papà…

translation.en: Li Na, we've been over this already.
translation.it: Li Na, ne abbiamo già parlato.

translation.en: I have to go, Din.
But I fixed our kite.
translation.it: Ma ho aggiustato il nostro aquilone.

translation.en: Come along, Li Na.
Take care, kiddo.
Bye, Din.
Eyes ahead, Na Na.
We're off to a… a better life, and we have to leave this one behind.
translation.it: Ci aspetta una vita migliore. Lasciamoci questa alle spalle.

translation.en: Okay, uh, next up, 235 Gao Shue Street.
translation.it: Ok. La prossima consegna è al 235 di Gao Shue Street.

translation.en: -Delivery! -Thank you!
You're welcome!
-Delivery! Have a nice day! -Thank you!
-Delivery! Welcome! -Thank you.
-Delivery! -Thank you.
-Delivery! -Thank you.
Oh, Wei! Wei, Wei, Wei, Wei!
Din? Be careful.
What are you doing?
-Wei! Old buddy… -Dude, you gotta watch where you're going.
translation.it: Wei! Vecchio mio… - Attento a dove vai. - Potresti prendermi i compiti?

translation.en: -Think you could get the assignment? -You haven't been to class in two weeks.
translation.it: - Attento a dove vai. - Potresti prendermi i compiti? Non vai a scuola da due settimane.

translation.en: I gotta earn extra cash for this thing I'm working on.
translation.it: Mi servono dei soldi in più per una cosa.

translation.en: Thing? Wait a minute, does this have to do with that girl?
translation.it: Ehi, c'entra qualcosa con quella ragazza?

translation.en: What? No.
Maybe.
Okay, it's her birthday. I'm planning something special.
translation.it: Sì. È per una cosa speciale per il suo compleanno.

translation.en: So, can you just get me the assignment, please?
translation.it: Potresti prendermi i compiti, per favore?

translation.en: -I'll do your homework for a week. -Fine.
translation.it: - Ti farò i compiti per una settimana. - Ok.

translation.en: Thanks. You're the best.
-[car horns honking] -So smart and yet so stupid.
[sighs] Last delivery.
Uh, hello?
Uh, hello?
Did somebody order dumpling soup?
translation.it: Qualcuno ha ordinato i ravioli brasati?

translation.en: -Um, hello? -[male voice] Come in.
It's locked.
I know.
Oh. Well, uh, I'll just… [grunts] …go around.
Did you order the dumpling soup?
I am a god.
Okay,
but did you order the--
translation.it: ma è lei che ha ordinato…

translation.en: And I have chosen you! For you are pure of heart.
translation.it: E ho scelto te! Perché il tuo cuore è puro.

translation.en: Well, I try to be friendly. Keep my five-star rating.
translation.it: Cerco di essere gentile, per avere le 5 stelle.

translation.en: Now, will you be paying with cash or--
Take this.
It contains everything you need.
translation.it: Contiene tutto ciò che ti serve.

translation.en: Um, actually, I need $7.35--
You dare reject the will of the gods?
translation.it: Osi rifiutare la volontà degli dei?

translation.en: Kind of…
yeah?
You know what? This one's on me, okay? I really gotta run, so…
translation.it: Sa che le dico? Offro io. Devo andare, quindi…

translation.en: Thanks for the teapot and have a nice day.
translation.it: Grazie per la teiera e buona giornata.

translation.en: Wait. Hot sauce! Huh?
Thanks.
It's just not the same without hot sauce.
translation.it: Senza non è la stessa cosa.

translation.en: -Don't you have somewhere to be? -Huh?
Wait, five o'clock?
How have I been here for an hour? I gotta go!
translation.it: Sono qui da un'ora? Devo andare!

translation.en: Don't close. Please, don't close.
Kid, be realistic.
Wait! Wait, wait, wait!
Okay, thank you for your help!
-Hey. I know! -Your mom's looking for you.
translation.it: - Ehi! - Ti cercava tua madre. Lo so!

translation.en: Water, water, water.
-D7 to checkmate! -Ooh!
See you tonight.
I said, "If you don't like garlic, eat something else!" -[laughter] -"Like a napkin!"
translation.it: Ho detto: "Se non ama l'aglio, mangi altro. Tipo un tovagliolo!"

translation.en: Hey, Mom. Here's the groceries you wanted.
Look who's here! You're late. Again.
translation.it: Guarda un po'! Sei in ritardo. Di nuovo.

translation.en: Oh. I, uh, stayed late for study group, as usual.
translation.it: Ero al gruppo studio, come sempre.

translation.en: Wait!
Eat. Food for your brain.
Thanks. I'll just take this inside and have it with a side of calculus.
translation.it: Grazie. Lo mangio dentro con contorno di algebra.

translation.en: Ah, look at him, all grown up and working hard.
Little Din with a college degree. Can you believe it?
translation.it: Il piccolo Din laureato. Ma ci credi?

translation.en: -I only wish my son had been so dedicated. -Such a good boy.
translation.it: - Se solo il mio fosse così diligente! - Che bravo!

translation.en: Doing my best. I'm gonna go get sta--
translation.it: - Faccio del mio meglio. Vado… - Sono felice per te.

translation.en: I'm happy for you, kiddo. Your future is all set.
translation.it: - Faccio del mio meglio. Vado… - Sono felice per te. Sei sistemato a vita.

translation.en: -A steady job, a big paycheck! -A shiny new refrigerator.
translation.it: - Un lavoro ben pagato! - Un frigo nuovo.

translation.en: -A nice car. -And a flat screen. Big one!
Now, now, stop distracting him!
-He's got work to do. -Din! I'll be right over.
translation.it: - Ha da fare. - Din! Arrivo subito.

translation.en: Uh, yes, so much work to do. I better get started on that--
translation.it: Sì, è verissimo. Sarà meglio che inizi a…

translation.en: Here's the assignment.
The teacher said if you don't come to at least one class this semester,
translation.it: Il prof ha detto che, se non vieni almeno a una lezione,

translation.en: he's going to fail you.
Oh, hey, Ms. Din. Even if you ace the final…
translation.it: Ehi, sig.ra Din. Anche se farai faville all'esame

translation.en: again.
I'm sorry.
I knew it. You've been skipping school and lying to your mother.
translation.it: Lo sapevo. Salti la scuola e menti a tua madre.

translation.en: What have you been doing? Lounging in some internet cafe?
translation.it: Per fare cosa? Oziare in un Internet point?

translation.en: -Can you believe it? -Such a bad boy.
You're not helping!
Why do this? You're a good student! You could ruin your future.
translation.it: - Senti… - Perché? Sei intelligente! Vuoi rovinarti il futuro?

translation.en: -True. There goes the college degree. -You're not helping!
translation.it: - Così ti giochi la laurea. - Non siete d'aiuto!

translation.en: -I just-- -Just what?
I was just doing a little side job.
Side job?
You have one job, and one job only. That is to study.
translation.it: Tu hai un solo lavoro: studiare.

translation.en: -I know, but-- -But what?
What could possibly be more important than studying?
translation.it: Cosa potrebbe esserci di più importante?

translation.en: Nothing, Mom.
Nothing.
-This is getting juicy. -What did he say? I can't hear.
translation.it: - Si fa interessante. - Che dice? Non sento.

translation.en: You're not helping!
-I know I'm hard on you, but I'm-- -You're right, Mom.
translation.it: - So che sono severa, ma… - Hai ragione.

translation.en: You're right.
[man 1] It's there?
This can't be right.
-Uh, what are we looking for again? -A teapot!
[man 2] Open the door.
Good evening, gentlemen.
This area's off-limits. Can I help you?
translation.it: Qui non si può entrare. Posso aiutarla?

translation.en: Yes, I believe you can.
Stop! Stop! Stop right there.
-Put your hands where I can see them. -Oh…
I'm afraid that's not going to happen.
-Uh… Okay, sir. -You first, man.
-You're under arrest. -Hold on a minute, there. [grunting]
I'll fix that later.
Aiya. She's late again.
[exhales] Okay.
What? Oh, that old thing.
Well, well, well. Look who decided to show up.
translation.it: Bene, bene, bene… Guarda chi ha deciso di farsi viva.

translation.en: Starting to take me for granted, huh?
translation.it: Inizi a darmi per scontato, eh?

translation.en: I'm kidding. I'm kidding.
So, what do you think of the suit?
Good enough to get into the birthday party of the famous Li Na Wang?
translation.it: Basterà per il compleanno della famosa Li Na Wang?

translation.en: Good.
I think so too.
Okay, Din, tomorrow's the big day.
How are we gonna do this? What am I gonna say?
Happy birthday, it's your best friend Din! No, that's too strong.
translation.it: "Buon compleanno! Sono il tuo amico, Din!" No, è troppo.

translation.en: Good evening, Li Na. Will you allow me to kiss your hand?
translation.it: "Buonasera, Li Na. Posso farti il baciamano?"

translation.en: Ugh. Man, quit being a creep, Din.
Oh yeah, sure, I'll dance with you.
Say, you look kind of familiar.
I got you a present. You still like kites?
translation.it: "Ho un regalo per te. Ami ancora gli aquiloni?"

translation.en: What am I saying? Of course she still likes kites.
translation.it: Ma che dico? Certo che sì.

translation.en: Okay, just… calm down.
Be honest.
Hey, Li Na. Happy birthday. I just want to say, -it's been a long time and… -[fabric fraying]
translation.it: "Ehi, Li Na! Buon compleanno. È passato tanto tempo e…

translation.en: …I miss you.
What?
-[gasps] Oh no! -[fabric rips] Oh, gosh. Um…
-Hold on, I can fix this. -[rips] Oh, come on.
translation.it: Aspetta, posso sistemare tutto. Ma dai!

translation.en: What was I thinking?
No, no, no!
I must look totally crazy.
It's just…
I don't know what else to do.
I can see my whole life laid out ahead of me,
translation.it: Vedo tutta la mia vita davanti a me. Sto facendo del mio meglio.

translation.en: and I'm trying my best, trying to make everyone proud,
translation.it: Vedo tutta la mia vita davanti a me. Sto facendo del mio meglio. Voglio rendere tutti fieri di me, ma sento come se mancasse qualcosa.

translation.en: but the whole time it feels like something is missing.
translation.it: Voglio rendere tutti fieri di me, ma sento come se mancasse qualcosa.

translation.en: I just wish…
I just wish I could keep our promise.
translation.it: Desidero solo mantenere la nostra promessa.

translation.en: Tea is ready.
Wait, what? The tea is ready?
Well, that was…
[male voice] Greetings, great master! The heavens have opened, your wishes will be granted,
translation.it: Salve, padrone! I cieli si sono aperti e i tuoi desideri saranno esauditi,

translation.en: for I am LongZhu! [echoing]
Oh, a peasant boy. Well, this'll be easy. [chuckles]
Look, I know what you're thinking.
"Do my eyes deceive me?" "A super, all-powerful, magical Wish Dragon!"
translation.it: "Sto sognando? Un potentissimo drago dei desideri magico!

translation.en: "Could this be real? Is magic real?"
Yes.
It's real.
Now that we got that out of the way, onto the important part.
Am I… am I dead?
Grandma! It's Din!
-I fell off the roof. I'm coming for you! -No, no.
translation.it: - Sono caduto dal tetto. Arrivo! - No.

translation.en: No, you're very much alive.
I am a magical Wish Dragon,
who will grant three wishes to the owner of this teapot.
translation.it: Esaudisco tre desideri del proprietario della teiera.

translation.en: And you, sir, are my master!
translation.it: E tu sei il mio padrone!

translation.en: So, go ahead, wish away!
Okay, you got me. Where are the hidden cameras?
translation.it: Ci sono cascato. Dove sono le telecamere?

translation.en: -Great joke, guys. -Joke?
-Is this a hologram or something? -I assure you not.
translation.it: - È un ologramma? - Ti assicuro di no.

translation.en: Do you wish for a suit of armor made of solid gold?
It shall be so. Do you wish for the strength of 1,000 men? Boom!
translation.it: Sarà fatto. Desideri essere forte come mille uomini?

translation.en: -It shall be so. -Whoa.
For the finest carriage in all the land?
translation.it: La carrozza più bella al mondo?

translation.en: Pow! It's yours!
The wings of a hawk!
Or the legs of a giraffe. Feels good up here, right? Or anything else
translation.it: Le zampe di una giraffa! È bello quassù, eh? Qualsiasi cosa

translation.en: that your heart desires.
I'm thinking about starting one of those--
translation.it: Vorrei aprire un posto dove si vendono gli animali.

translation.en: Where they sell animals. Pet-type stores.
translation.it: Vorrei aprire un posto dove si vendono gli animali. I negozi di animali.

translation.en: You going to sell Chow Chows? That's a good dog.
translation.it: Venderai Chow Chow? Sono bei cani!

translation.en: No one will be selling anything if we don't find that teapot.
translation.it: Non si farà niente se non troveremo la teiera.

translation.en: Every time I try to make casual conversation, you guys give me a hard time.
translation.it: Appena inizio a chiacchierare, rovinate sempre tutto.

translation.en: So, you're a Wish Dragon?
Yes.
How many wishes do I get?
You get three wishes.
-How do you fit in this teapot? -Uh, it's magic. It's a magic teapot.
translation.it: - Come entri in questa teiera? - È una teiera magica.

translation.en: So small. How old are you?
-That's not-- -Where'd you come from?
-All you need-- -Look at your arms.
Why are you pink? Shouldn't you be green? Your face is so soft. I want to touch it.
translation.it: Perché sei rosa e non verde? Come sei morbido!

translation.en: Oh, can you breathe fire? [splutters]
Okay. Look, peasant boy.
I don't have time. I'm not here to be your friend--
translation.it: Piantala con le domande. Non sono tuo amico…

translation.en: Whoa, you have to earn my friendship, and frankly you're not doing a good job.
translation.it: La mia amicizia va guadagnata, e tu non lo stai facendo.

translation.en: Listen carefully. Every Wish Dragon must serve 10 masters
translation.it: Ogni drago dei desideri deve servire 10 padroni

translation.en: before they're free to enter the spirit world. And you are the last one.
translation.it: prima di poter entrare nel mondo degli spiriti. Tu sei l'ultimo.

translation.en: Now, I've been stuck… [high-pitched] …in this teapot for 1,000 years.
translation.it: Sono prigioniero di questa teiera da mille anni.

translation.en: The sooner we get this over with, the better.
translation.it: Prima ce la sbrighiamo, meglio è.

translation.en: [normally] Have I made myself clear?
I'm terribly sorry, young man, but I need that teapot.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, giovanotto, ma mi serve quella teiera.

translation.en: Uh, I-- I think it's his. Only the owner of the teapot can see me.
translation.it: - È sua. - Solo il mio padrone può vedermi.

translation.en: Well, I'm sure he won't miss it.
translation.it: Sono sicuro che non gli mancherà.

translation.en: No way. I found it. Whoa!
Not good. I wish I knew how to fight. [grunts]
translation.it: Non va bene. Quanto desidererei saper combattere!

translation.en: Come here.
That's a good teapot.
What the…
[gasps] No, no, no, I didn't mean that.
I take it back.
Gimme that.
Teapot.
Give me that teapot right now.
Whoa, I just kicked through a door!
Gimme! Gimme! Mine! Mine!
You little twerp!
Uh… nobody's home?
I'm done asking nicely.
translation.it: Ora basta con le buone maniere.

translation.en: Are you telling me a teenage boy out-fought two full-grown men?
translation.it: Mi state dicendo che un ragazzino ha sconfitto due adulti?

translation.en: -Well, sir-- -Actually, three men.
-Two-and-a-half. -You should have seen him.
It was 1,000 punches a minute. Kicks everywhere.
I've never seen so many arms and legs.
translation.it: Un vortice di braccia e gambe!

translation.en: [sighs] This is not good.
The boy knows what he has.
translation.it: Il ragazzo sa che cosa ha.

translation.en: Sir, if I may ask, what exactly does he have?
translation.it: Signore, se posso chiedere, cos'è che ha esattamente?

translation.en: That's none of your business. I'm paying you to find it.
translation.it: Non sono affari vostri. Vi pago per trovarla.

translation.en: -That is your only concern. -You haven't paid.
translation.it: - Tutto qua. - Non ci ha pagato.

translation.en: You'll be paid when I have the teapot, beyond your wildest dreams! Do you understand?
translation.it: Vi pagherò quando avrò la teiera. Vi ricoprirò d'oro! Avete capito?

translation.en: Forgive our incompetence, sir. But the boy did leave something behind.
translation.it: Perdoni la nostra incompetenza. Ma il ragazzo ha lasciato qualcosa.

translation.en: It's only a matter of time before we find him.
translation.it: Non ci vorrà molto per trovarlo.

translation.en: Din, up now!
-[groggily] How about a kick to the face? -Huh? I said up!
translation.it: Magari un calcio in faccia? Alzati!

translation.en: -Ow. -Breakfast is on the table.
Thanks, Mom.
What a crazy dream.
Din, I'm working late tonight.
So, leftovers for dinner, okay?
Delicious.
So, leftovers for dinner.
Yeah.
Leftovers.
Stupid shoes.
Hey Mom, if you could wish for anything, what would it be?
translation.it: Se potessi esprimere un desiderio, cosa sarebbe?

translation.en: Din, why are you asking silly questions? Eat.
Okay, but seriously, Mom,
if you could wish for anything.
-A big house in the countryside? -Din, we went over this yesterday.
translation.it: - Una casa in campagna. - Ne abbiamo parlato ieri.

translation.en: I want you to focus on your future. That is what I wish for.
translation.it: Voglio che pensi al tuo futuro. Ecco cosa desidero.

translation.en: I'm more focused than I've ever been in my entire life.
translation.it: Non ho mai pensato così tanto al mio futuro.

translation.en: Hmm. Good. Now hurry up. You're gonna be late.
-What's that face? I know that. -I don't have a face. What?
translation.it: - Cos'è quella faccia? - Non ho nessuna faccia. Che faccia?

translation.en: Go to school. Stop planning things.
Um, hello? Dragon thingy?
You in there?
Excellent work, peasant boy.
One wish down, two to go. We could be done by lunch.
translation.it: Mancano due desideri. Potremmo finire per pranzo.

translation.en: What did you do to me? Why do I know kung fu?
translation.it: Come mai conosco il kung fu?

translation.en: You're welcome. You wish you could fight. I made you a master.
translation.it: Desideravi saper combattere. Ora sei un maestro.

translation.en: I didn't wish for… Hey, that's not fair. You said "wish."
translation.it: - Non avevo… Non è giusto! - L'hai desiderato.

translation.en: Oh, so just 'cause I said "wish," now I'm stuck with these kung fu powers?
translation.it: Quindi, sarò un mago del kung fu solo perché l'ho desiderato?

translation.en: -[grunts] -Cool.
Yes, it's all very cool.
So, onto that second wish.
Let me recommend the all-time favorite.
A giant pile of gold!
Now, repeat after me. "I wish for…" You're not talking.
translation.it: Ripeti dopo di me… Desidero… Forza.

translation.en: "A giant pile of…" You're not saying anything.
translation.it: Una montagna… È strano se non parli.

translation.en: Hey, stop rushing me.
Ah, you must be the conquering type. I see that killer instinct in your eyes.
translation.it: Sei un conquistatore. Noto il tuo istinto assassino.

translation.en: Easy. Just wish for your very own personal army!
Why would I need an army?
You're quite a simple fellow.
Not to worry. Here's one the peasant-folk love.
translation.it: Eccone uno che i plebei amano molto.

translation.en: I can allow you to speak with a loved one on the other side of China!
translation.it: Ti farò parlare con un tuo caro che vive dall'altra parte della Cina!

translation.en: I'm a loved one. I can't hear you. You're very far away.
translation.it: Sono un tuo caro. Sei lontano e non ti sento.

translation.en: -There's a wall here. It's cool, but-- -You mean, like, a cell phone?
translation.it: Qui c'è un muro. È forte, ma… Tipo un cellulare?

translation.en: What dark magic is this? Where is the tiny orchestra?
translation.it: Cos'è questa magia oscura? Dov'è l'orchestra?

translation.en: How do they fit in this metal box? Two wishes. Anything I want.
translation.it: - Come ci entrano in questo cosino? - Due desideri. Qualsiasi cosa.

translation.en: [gasps] The birthday party. I know what I want.
Wait, a wish?
Yeah, yeah, a wish.
Excellent.
A giant metal bird?
-What are you doing? -Uh, riding my magical Wish Dragon. Away!
translation.it: Che fai? Salgo sul mio drago magico. Via!

translation.en: What are you doing?
If you're not gonna let me ride you, we catch the bus.
translation.it: Se non mi aiuti, dovremo prendere il bus.

translation.en: The "bus"? Is that some kind of animal?
translation.it: Il bus? - È un animale? - Da quanto sei nella teiera?

translation.en: -How long have you been in that teapot? -Is it still the Qing Dynasty?
translation.it: - È un animale? - Da quanto sei nella teiera? - Non lo so. C'è ancora la dinastia Qing? - Long!

translation.en: -Ooh! -Long!
translation.it: - Non lo so. C'è ancora la dinastia Qing? - Long!

translation.en: How did you get in there?
Don't ignore me when I'm talking, peasant.
It's not a little man. It's television.
translation.it: Non è un uomo. È una TV.

translation.en: What's this?
[Din] Car.
Ah, the spoils of war on display?
-What is this invisible force-- -[Din] Glass!
-What purpose-- -Stop light.
-What in the world? -Ice cream.
-How is this-- -Electricity.
-I know it's all amazing-- -Amazing?
When you've been around as long as I have, there's nothing in this world that could amaze--
translation.it: Quando arrivi alla mia età, nulla al mondo può sorprenderti…

translation.en: "Shrimp chips." Peasant food, no doubt.
translation.it: "Nuvole di gambero." Cibo da plebei, ovvio.

translation.en: Magnificent!
Okay, we're here.
-You gonna make a wish now? -I will. Just wait until we get there.
translation.it: - Esprimerai un desiderio? - Prima dobbiamo arrivare.

translation.en: -Get where? -[horn honks]
Great Wall of China!
A giant chariot made of steel and glass! Long, this is bus. Come on.
translation.it: - Un carro gigante di acciaio e vetro! - È un bus.

translation.en: -Out of the way. -My word!
-And watch your step. Carefully. -Thank you, kind sir.
translation.it: - E faccia attenzione qui. - Grazie, signore.

translation.en: -No. There must be a better… -Long, what are you doing?
translation.it: - Dev'esserci un modo migliore… - Che fai?

translation.en: That's more like it.
Long, what are you doing? Getting a personal carriage.
translation.it: - Long, cosa fai? - Riservo un carro personale.

translation.en: I can't afford a personal carriage, which is why we were taking the bus.
translation.it: Non posso permettermelo. Per questo prendiamo il bus.

translation.en: Did you just steal my money?
-…we won't make the express. -Here.
-Hey, where did you get this? -You know, magic.
translation.it: - Dove li hai presi? - È stata magia.

translation.en: I, uh, had a really big lunch.
This is more like it!
Uh, what is this? Traffic.
Traffic.
-That some kind of national holiday? -Ha!
You mean to tell me this happens every single day?
translation.it: Stai dicendo che succede ogni singolo giorno?

translation.en: The sun is moving faster than us.
translation.it: Il sole è più veloce di noi.

translation.en: This is worse than my teapot.
Ugh! I'm never going to make it in time. I wish this traffic would just--
translation.it: Non arriverò mai in tempo. Quanto desidererei che…

translation.en: Yes, go ahead.
Long, I'm not gonna waste a wish on traffic!
-Look, Din, you're gonna have to use-- -[honking]
You're gonna have to--
You're going to have to--
-You're gonna have to use-- -[honks]
Use a wish! You son of a cabbage farmer! There is no place to go!
translation.it: Usa un desiderio! Figlio di un contadino! Non si passa!

translation.en: Blow your trumpet all you want. It won't make any difference at all!
translation.it: Puoi suonare quanto ti pare. Tanto non cambia niente!

translation.en: You know, Long, we'll get there eventually. Even if it takes all day.
translation.it: Prima o poi arriveremo, Long. Anche se ci vorrà tutto il giorno.

translation.en: All day? I heard one traffic jam lasted three weeks. [sighs]
translation.it: - Tutto il giorno? - Una volta ci vollero tre settimane.

translation.en: If only I had a magical dragon that could fly.
translation.it: Se solo avessi un drago su cui volare.

translation.en: I know what you're trying. Not gonna work.
I spent 1,000 years in that teapot. I can spend hours in your traffic.
translation.it: Dopo mille anni nella teiera, qualche ora nel traffico non è nulla.

translation.en: Hey, I got an idea. Why don't we listen to the tiny orchestra while we wait?
translation.it: Perché non ascoltiamo l'orchestra mentre aspettiamo.

translation.en: Not gonna work, Din.
Use your wish, Din.
[Long] Fine!
Careful what you don't wish for.
translation.it: Fa' attenzione. Se tiri troppo la corda, non esiterò a…

translation.en: -Push me too far, I will not hesitate to-- -Fly everywhere?
translation.it: Fa' attenzione. Se tiri troppo la corda, non esiterò a… Volare dappertutto?

translation.en: You're amazing! Look. Is there anything you can't do?
translation.it: Sei mitico! C'è qualcosa che non puoi fare?

translation.en: Well, that's very-- Ah!
[chuckles awkwardly] Anyways, where are we going?
Ah, there it is! Down there.
We're here. -Wishing time. -Ah!
translation.it: Ci siamo. È ora del desiderio.

translation.en: Excellent. I see where this is going.
Now, when choosing a palace, it is very important that--
translation.it: Quando scegli un palazzo, è importante…

translation.en: Uh, what are you do--
-[groans] -Quit goofing off. This is serious.
Okay, what's the wish? Okay, you see her?
translation.it: - Qual è il desiderio? - La vedi?

translation.en: Hi, good evening.
-Thank you for coming. -Li Na, happy birthday.
How are you?
That's my second wish, Long.
-I wish-- -Stop, stop, stop!
-I can't do love. -What? No, Long, it's not--
translation.it: - L'amore no. - Cosa? No, Long, non è…

translation.en: Couple of rules. I can't time travel, I can't kill,
translation.it: Niente viaggi nel tempo, niente omicidi,

translation.en: and it pains me to inform you, not really, I can't make people fall in love with you.
translation.it: e, mi dispiace, ma non posso far innamorare le persone.

translation.en: No, no, no, it's not like that, Long.
She's my best friend. That's my wish.
translation.it: È la mia migliore amica. È il mio desiderio.

translation.en: I want my friend back.
Wait, rewind. You can wish for anything in the whole world,
and you waste it on a friend?
What could be more important?
-Is that a trick question? -No.
Literally anything else.
Let me think, a golden chamber pot, a palace made entirely of jade,
translation.it: Fammi pensare… Un pitale d'oro, un palazzo di giada,

translation.en: an army of terracotta warriors! Why are you wasting a wish on some girl?
translation.it: un esercito di terracotta! Perché sprecarlo su una ragazza?

translation.en: Oh! That's right.
Sorry, I can't expect you to understand.
translation.it: Non puoi capire. Non ti ho spiegato la situazione.

translation.en: I haven't explained everything. Down, please.
translation.it: Non puoi capire. Non ti ho spiegato la situazione. Mettimi giù.

translation.en: Ten years ago, a cool spring day. A gentle breeze.
translation.it: Dieci anni fa. Un giorno di primavera, una leggera brezza…

translation.en: A lonely boy waits after school. Me.
translation.it: Un bambino aspetta dopo la scuola. Io.

translation.en: Enter the girl, Li Na, throwing dumplings and defending my honor. Then we…
translation.it: Arriva Li Na, che difende il mio onore a colpi di ravioli…

translation.en: [Long] This is really happening. This should be so easy.
translation.it: Sta succedendo davvero? Dovrebbe essere facile. Tre desideri e via. Invece…

translation.en: Three wishes and I'm done. But no, I get stuck with this simpleton.
translation.it: Dovrebbe essere facile. Tre desideri e via. Invece… Mi capita questo babbeo.

translation.en: Just look at him with his mindless grin.
So naive. So ignorant.
So stupid.
Why? What have I done to deserve this?
translation.it: Perché? Cosa ho fatto per meritarmi questo?

translation.en: And then she drove away and I never saw her again.
translation.it: Poi sale in auto e se ne va, e io non l'ho più vista.

translation.en: It's okay, Long. I get emotional too just talking about it.
translation.it: Lo so, anch'io mi commuovo a parlarne.

translation.en: I can't make people fall in love. Why would I make someone your friend?
translation.it: Ti ho detto che l'amore no. È lo stesso per l'amicizia.

translation.en: What? No, she's already my friend. I just need to get into the party.
translation.it: Cosa? È già mia amica. Devo solo andare alla festa.

translation.en: A wish! Why didn't you just say so? Yeah, I wish to be a princeling.
translation.it: - Un desiderio! Perché non l'hai detto? - Desidero essere un ereditiere.

translation.en: All right, here we go. Stand back and it shall be so!
translation.it: Ci siamo. Un passo indietro e lo diventerai!

translation.en: Done and done. Now, onto that final wish.
What is this?
What? I made you a prince.
No, no, I said princeling. Like one of those guys with the fancy suit,
translation.it: No, un ereditiere. Uno di quei tipi con l'abito elegante,

translation.en: the Rolex watch and the chauffeured car, -the personal assistant-- -[splutters]
translation.it: il Rolex, l'auto privata e l'assistente personale…

translation.en: That's like ten different wishes. You have two.
translation.it: Quelli sono 10 desideri. Ne hai solo due.

translation.en: Fine. How about a temporary version, just for today?
translation.it: Una cosa temporanea, magari? Solo per oggi.

translation.en: You're seriously going to wish to be rich for 24 hours?
translation.it: Desideri essere ricco solo per 24 ore?

translation.en: I don't care about that.
translation.it: Quella roba non conta. Voglio solo parlare con Li Na.

translation.en: I just need to reconnect with Li Na. She won't care if I'm poor.
translation.it: Quella roba non conta. Voglio solo parlare con Li Na. Per lei non conta.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm sorry I'm laughing, but that is the dumbest thing I've ever heard. Of course she'll care.
translation.it: Scusa se rido. È la cosa più stupida che abbia mai sentito. Certo che conta!

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's my wish and not yours. Shoot me with your magic juice.
translation.it: Beh, è il mio desiderio, non il tuo. Vai con il tuo potere magico!

translation.en: Fine, 24 hours.
Perfect!
And the car.
Perfect.
And the personal assistant who has to do everything I ask for the next 24 hours.
translation.it: E l'assistente che farà tutto ciò che vorrò per 24 ore.

translation.en: Long, you look good as a human. Now, walking can be tricky, but--
translation.it: Non stai male da umano. Camminare può essere…

translation.en: Okay, party time.
Oh, uh.
[bald man] Good afternoon. I'd like to inquire about a customer.
translation.it: Buon pomeriggio. Vorrei parlarle di un cliente.

translation.en: Follow me.
[chuckles] Oh, yeah. Now, these are my kind of people.
translation.it: Questa è la gente che fa per me.

translation.en: The servants' entrance is around back.
This is amazing.
Oh, you got in.
-I've never been so humiliated in-- -Coat check, thank you.
translation.it: - Mai stato così umiliato… - Nel guardaroba.

translation.en: There she is.
She looks so…
important.
-Li Na. -It's so good to see you again.
How does it feel to be 19, dear?
translation.it: Cosa si prova ad avere 19 anni?

translation.en: Oh, well, I've actually been feeling really confused lately--
translation.it: Beh, di recente, sono alquanto confusa…

translation.en: Great, dear. What would you say about being the new face of Shin Makeup?
translation.it: Ottimo. Che ne dici di essere il nuovo volto di Shin Makeup?

translation.en: Actually, I no longer rep products that use animal testing.
translation.it: Non rappresento prodotti testati sugli animali.

translation.en: -Where's your father? -Li Na?
translation.it: - Ottimo. Dov'è tuo padre? - Li Na?

translation.en: I'll have him sign the contract.
-Li Na! -It's so great to see you again!
I want to talk about your future. I've been thinking about my future.
translation.it: - Parliamo del tuo futuro. - Ci sto riflettendo molto.

translation.en: Inflatable bras, the future of fashion. I want you to be a part.
translation.it: Reggiseni gonfiabili. Sono il futuro della moda.

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm not sure-- -That's great!
I'll have a shoot scheduled ASAP.
-Happy birthday! -It's so-- Oh, it's you, Buckley.
We're halfway through the list. You're doing great.
translation.it: Siamo a metà degli ospiti. Va alla grande.

translation.en: Yeah, great. Any word from my dad?
He's working hard, just like we are.
So, how about a little bit less of this,
translation.it: Un po' meno di questo, ok?

translation.en: and more of this!
All right, Din. [exhales] Here we go.
Got it. Game face.
-Whoo. Here we go! -Hi, Li Na! Happy--
Hi, it's so great to see you again.
-Oh, i feel that same way. So-- -This is just the greatest day of my life.
translation.it: - Anche per me e… - È un giorno grandioso.

translation.en: Uh, wow, you too? Uh, wait, before I forget, I brought you a little something.
translation.it: Anche per te? Prima che mi dimentichi, ho una cosa per te.

translation.en: -Hi, it's so good to see you again. -Actually, we never met.
translation.it: - È bello rivederla. - Non ci conosciamo.

translation.en: -If I may? -Hi, it's so great to see you again.
So, how's your best friend?
I… I don't know what happened. She didn't even recognize me.
translation.it: Non so cosa sia successo. Non mi ha riconosciuto.

translation.en: Great. Dreams crushed. We're done here, right? I'll have two to go.
translation.it: Sogni infranti! Finito, giusto? Ne prendo due da portare via.

translation.en: [emcee] Ladies and gentlemen, time for a treat.
If we could have the birthday girl and her father come to the dance floor… There she is.
translation.it: La festeggiata e suo padre sulla pista da ballo! Eccola.

translation.en: And now her father, Mr. Wang, come to the stage.
translation.it: E ora suo padre, il signor Wang, prego.

translation.en: Calling Mr. Wang!
-Come on, Dad. Don't be shy. -Mr. Wang?
Mr. Wang, come on down!
I'm sure he'll be here any second.
Mr. Wang.
Wang? Do I have the right name?
What kind of father doesn't show up to his daughter's birthday?
translation.it: Che razza di padre non si presenta al compleanno della figlia?

translation.en: -[man 2] I know. -Come on.
-We gotta do something. -[emcee] Mic was on. I apologize.
translation.it: - Già. - Dobbiamo fare qualcosa. Scusate per il microfono.

translation.en: [Din] Ladies and gentlemen, if I could have your attention here.
translation.it: Signore e signori, la vostra attenzione, prego.

translation.en: It's time for the entertainment portion.
Long, make some smoke. Lights.
[Din] From the streets of Shaolin, kung fu like you've never seen it before.
translation.it: Dallo Shaolin, il kung fu come non l'avete mai visto!

translation.en: Introducing the great master!
Trained in the art of Dragon Style.
Now, everyone, keep your eyes on the stage as I…
translation.it: Tenete gli occhi sul palco mentre io…

translation.en: Uh, that's it. Show's over. Thank you, folks. Bye!
translation.it: Lo spettacolo è finito. Grazie. Ciao!

translation.en: Personal assistant. Never been so insulted.
Lucky number eight!
Sir, caviar crème anglaise amuse-bouche?
translation.it: Amuse-bouche di caviale e crema inglese?

translation.en: You don't have any, uh, shrimp chips, do you?
translation.it: Per caso avete le nuvole di gambero?

translation.en: Uh, no.
Oh, no. What's a man like you doing all by himself?
translation.it: - Oh, no. - Cosa ci fa un uomo come te tutto solo?

translation.en: So true. Who needs wine when you have good company?
translation.it: Già. A chi serve il vino se sei in buona compagnia?

translation.en: I believe you've misunder-- [hiccups]
[laughs] I don't normally move this fast, but…
translation.it: Di solito non sono sfacciata, ma…

translation.en: Sorry, must run.
Hello…
Oh, handsome?
Playing hard to get, I see.
Water. Water. I just need water.
Refreshing.
Where's that kid?
Hello?
-Li Na, is that you? -Go away. I'm busy.
translation.it: - Li Na, sei tu? - Vattene. Sono occupata.

translation.en: Ah, yeah, I can see you're busy. Yes, very busy.
Okay, I… I just…
I'm the one who did that whole kung fu thing.
translation.it: Sono il tipo che ha fatto la cosa del kung fu.

translation.en: I was just trying to…
I know what you were trying to do.
Thanks.
Are you okay?
Yeah.
I'm fine.
Here, take this.
Thank you.
Just… just one night out of the whole year,
translation.it: È solo… Pensavo che, almeno una sera l'anno, avrebbe avuto tempo per me.

translation.en: I thought maybe he could make time.
translation.it: Pensavo che, almeno una sera l'anno, avrebbe avuto tempo per me.

translation.en: I don't know why I'm letting it get to me.
translation.it: Non so perché me la prendo così.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
This is so embarrassing. I don't normally cry like this.
translation.it: È così imbarazzante. Di solito non piango così.

translation.en: Here, you got a little something on your face.
Yeah, it's not really coming off.
[gasps] I'm sorry. I must look totally crazy.
No, no.
I just… don't know what else to do.
translation.it: È solo che non so che altro fare.

translation.en: It's like, I can see my whole life laid out ahead of me,
translation.it: Vedo tutta la mia vita davanti a me.

translation.en: and I'm trying my best, trying to make everyone proud,
translation.it: Faccio del mio meglio. Voglio rendere tutti fieri di me,

translation.en: but… no matter how hard I try, I just feel like…
translation.it: ma continuo a sentire come se…

translation.en: Like…
[both] Something is missing.
Exactly.
[woman] There you are, snake eyes.
I'm sorry, do I--
Oh, jeez, are you okay?
I'm fine.
Here.
Thanks.
I'm sorry for being so rude. I don't think I got your name earlier.
translation.it: Scusa la maleducazione. Non ho afferrato il tuo nome.

translation.en: Have we met before?
Um, well, actually…
I'm--
There you are. Miss Wang, thank goodness.
Just in time. Your father will be here any second.
translation.it: Appena in tempo. Suo padre sta per arrivare.

translation.en: -He made it? -Uh, yes.
Li Na! There you are.
-Oh. Hi, Dad. -Buckley informs me the party was perfect.
translation.it: - Ciao, papà. - Buckley dice che la festa era perfetta.

translation.en: Oh! Uh, yes, it was.
-Thank you, Dad. -You had a good time?
Yes, of course. I spoke to everyone you wanted me to
translation.it: Sì. Ho parlato con tutti quanti

translation.en: and I think I was able to make some really important… connections.
translation.it: e credo di aver stabilito molti contatti importanti.

translation.en: Hello? Hello? Ah, there we go.
translation.it: IN ATTESA Pronto? Ok, ci siamo. Ti ho portato qualcosa di speciale.

translation.en: Here, I brought you something special.
translation.it: Pronto? Ok, ci siamo. Ti ho portato qualcosa di speciale.

translation.en: -Here you are. -Go ahead. Open it!
I had to send my assistant to half the jewelers in Shanghai.
translation.it: Buckley è passato da metà dei gioiellieri della città.

translation.en: It's true.
-I know you appreciate something special. -Oh, of course.
translation.it: Sapevo che ti sarebbe piaciuto. Sì, come mi piacque anche l'anno scorso.

translation.en: Just as much as last year.
translation.it: Sì, come mi piacque anche l'anno scorso.

translation.en: Thank you, Dad.
Oh, uh, did I? Na Na, I'm sorry. You know, I--
translation.it: Davvero? Na Na, mi dispiace. Sai…

translation.en: Well, you can never have too much of a good thing, right?
translation.it: Quando qualcosa è bello, più ce n'è, meglio è.

translation.en: Excuse me, I… I didn't see you there, young man.
Allow me to get you a closer look, sir.
Here you are.
[Mr. Wang] Good quality leather, excellent suit, Rolex.
translation.it: Pelle di buona qualità, un bell'abito, un Rolex…

translation.en: And what's the family business?
translation.it: Di che si occupa la tua famiglia?

translation.en: Uh, dumplings!
I mean, Dumpling House. I mean, restaurants in general.
translation.it: Ravioli! Ristoranti di ravioli. Ristoranti in generale. Tutti quanti.

translation.en: All of them.
Ah, a young man of means, I see. Reminds me of myself. You two should have lunch.
translation.it: Un giovanotto ricco. Mi ricordi me. Pranzate insieme.

translation.en: -Dad! -Uh, yes.
-Of course. I'd love that. -Excellent.
translation.it: - Papà! - Sì, certo. - Mi piacerebbe. - Ottimo.

translation.en: Let's have arrangements made. Forgive my manners.
I didn't get your name.
Oh, I'm…
-Dan. -Pleasure to meet you, Dan. Where would you like to go?
translation.it: - Dan. - Piacere. Li Na, dove vorresti andare?

translation.en: The Pearl Tower's excellent. I have a reservation--
translation.it: Pearl Tower è ottimo. Ho un tavolo…

translation.en: -Excuse me, sir. A very important call. -Just give me a few minutes.
translation.it: - Signore, una telefonata urgente. - Dammi qualche minuto.

translation.en: Sir, they said they need to talk now.
[sighs] Put them on.
Good evening, sorry to keep you waiting.
So, um, would you really like to--
Yes. Yeah. [chuckles]
See you tomorrow, Dan.
We talked and it was just like old times. We made arrangements to have lunch. Can you believe it?
translation.it: Abbiamo parlato come ai vecchi tempi. Domani pranziamo insieme. Ma ci credi?

translation.en: I can't believe you didn't explain what a toilet is.
Everything is going to plan! Oh, really, Dan.
translation.it: - Va tutto alla grande! - Davvero, Dan?

translation.en: Uh, I'll come clean when the time's right. You're not gonna, because there is no right time.
translation.it: - Le dirò tutto al momento giusto. - Questo non accadrà mai.

translation.en: You're the peasant, she's the princess. Tale as old as time. And we all know how that ends.
translation.it: Tu sei il plebeo e lei la principessa. È la solita storia. Sai come finisce.

translation.en: -Good? -No, not good. Terribly. Horribly!
Long, we have a special bond that runs deeper than money or status.
translation.it: Il nostro legame è più forte dei soldi o del rango.

translation.en: Why'd you lie? Well, I… uh…
I'll tell you.
Because the minute Li Na finds out who you are, this will all fall apart.
translation.it: Appena Li Na scoprirà chi sei, andrà tutto a rotoli.

translation.en: You should learn to have faith in humanity.
I've been around for 1,000 years. I know how humans work. Not you.
translation.it: Imparare? Ho mille anni. So come sono gli umani.

translation.en: -Poor Long. I see your problem. -You're my problem.
translation.it: - So io qual è il tuo problema. - Sei tu.

translation.en: I wouldn't expect your tiny, reptilian brain to understand
translation.it: Il tuo cervello rettiliano non può capire

translation.en: the power of human friendship. It's okay. I'll be your first and only friend. Come here.
translation.it: il potere dell'amicizia umana. Sarò io il tuo primo amico. Vieni.

translation.en: I had a million friends when I was human. Oh, no.
translation.it: Avevo un milione di amici da umano. Oh, no!

translation.en: Long,
-were you a-- -Yes, yes, I was human.
For heaven's sake, have you even looked at the teapot?
And I was the best human ever!
translation.it: Ed ero il migliore umano di tutti!

translation.en: One of the most beloved, respected lords in history! You know why?
translation.it: Uno dei re più amati e rispettati della storia! E sai perché?

translation.en: -You had a lot of friends? -No!
I had all the wealth and land and power, and everyone loved me for it.
translation.it: Ero il più ricco e il più potente e tutti mi amavano.

translation.en: Wait, if you're so great, why haven't I heard of you?
translation.it: Perché non ho mai sentito parlare di te?

translation.en: We-- Well, obviously some jealous rival took credit for everything after I died.
translation.it: Ovviamente, un rivale geloso si prese tutto il merito dopo la mia morte.

translation.en: You died. The heavens made you a Wish Dragon? Yes, as a reward.
translation.it: - E sei diventato un drago dei desideri? - Come ricompensa.

translation.en: -You don't seem happy. -I'm very happy.
translation.it: - Non sembri contento. - Sì che lo sono.

translation.en: So, if you would just use your last wish, and wish for the same thing as every other master,
translation.it: Quindi, se potessi esprimere il tuo ultimo scontatissimo desiderio,

translation.en: then I can be done and leave this wretched world.
translation.it: potrei lasciare questo mondo una volta per tutte

translation.en: And finally return back to heaven,
where everyone is waiting to welcome the great emperor home with a parade.
translation.it: dove il grande imperatore sarà accolto con una parata.

translation.en: They have parades in heaven?
My point is there's a simple solution to every problem in the world.
translation.it: Esiste una semplice soluzione per ogni problema.

translation.en: Including yours. Use it.
So, that's what you've learned after all these years?
translation.it: È questo che hai imparato dopo tutti questi anni?

translation.en: Yes.
Crap, ten o'clock? My mom's getting off work. Long, we gotta go! Hurry! Let's go!
translation.it: Sono le 22? La mamma sta per tornare. Long, dobbiamo andare! Sbrigati!

translation.en: [Mr. Wang] Sir, surely you can extend the loan one more week.
translation.it: Ma di certo potrà concedermi un'altra settimana.

translation.en: I promise, I can pay you back, sir.
Foreclosure? Please, sir. I'm begging you.
This company is my life's work. I have a family and a respons--
translation.it: Quest'azienda è la mia vita. Ho una famiglia e…

translation.en: -Is everything all right, sir? -It's fine.
translation.it: FINE CHIAMATA - Va tutto bene, signore? - Sì. Solo…

translation.en: just don't tell Li Na about any of this.
translation.it: Non dire niente a Li Na.

translation.en: Well, have you found it?
We've located the boy's apartment, sir.
Yes, and?
There's no way he can come or go without being caught.
translation.it: Non può entrare né uscire senza che lo vediamo.

translation.en: Good.
Okay, in the teapot. Everything's normal.
translation.it: Entra nella teiera. È tutto normale.

translation.en: -Lights on. -Think you can bring Li Na to this dump?
translation.it: - Luce. - Porterai Li Na in questa topaia?

translation.en: Quiet, you! Homework out.
Her fridge is bigger than this apartment.
translation.it: È più piccola del suo frigo.

translation.en: If you're not gonna say something helpful, don't say anything.
translation.it: Se non mi aiuti… Scarpe! Non dire niente.

translation.en: She's here!
Uh, your suit.
Huh? Oh, no!
Din, I brought you some…
Hello, Mother. Sure is hot out tonight, isn't it?
No, it's freezing. You coming down with something?
translation.it: No, si gela. - Ti stai ammalando? - No, è…

translation.en: Oh, no. Just… studying.
translation.it: - Ti stai ammalando? - No, è… - Sto studiando. - Ok. Ecco.

translation.en: Okay. Here.
-I'll heat you up some leftovers. -Li Na will love leftovers.
translation.it: - Ti riscaldo gli avanzi. - Le piaceranno, certo.

translation.en: -Hey, stop it! -Stop what?
Uh, stop worrying about me. I'm fine.
translation.it: Di preoccuparti per me. - Sto bene. - Non sembra.

translation.en: You don't seem fine.
-How was school? -Great. School was great.
You lie to everyone, not just yourself.
-Leave me alone. -Fine.
[gasps] No, Mom. I was just…
-You know where to find me. -…talking to somebody else.
translation.it: - Sai dove trovarmi. - …parlando con qualcun altro?

translation.en: Din, I'm going to ask you a question.
Remember, I'm your mother.
You can tell me the truth.
Are you…
drinking alcohol?
-No. Gimme that! I'm not drinking. -Where are you hiding it?
translation.it: - No. Ridammela! - Cosa nascondi? Non bevo!

translation.en: Don't lie to me! Staying out late! Skipping school!
translation.it: Non mentire! Rientri tardi, salti la scuola…

translation.en: -You're acting crazy all the time. -Mom!
I am your mother! I know when something is wrong.
translation.it: Sono tua madre! So che c'è qualcosa.

translation.en: -What is it? -Nothing is wrong!
Just tell me the truth. Whatever it is, I can help.
Mom, you can't.
Believe me.
You can't.
Go to your room. Don't come out if you're going to disrespect me.
translation.it: Vai in camera se vuoi mancarmi di rispetto.

translation.en: -I wasn't-- -Go!
Fine!
[groans] I hate this place.
-They're really going at it. -Bring that chair.
translation.it: - Litigano di brutto. - Dammi la sedia.

translation.en: Popcorn, anyone?
I can hear you.
[Din's mom] Din.
Here.
You…
you need a real dinner.
Thanks.
Sorry, Mom.
Hey, little buddy. You're so cute. You have family? Are you hungry?
translation.it: Come sei carino! Hai una famiglia? Hai fame?

translation.en: You're such a cute, fluffy, little, hairy-faced… [babbling]
translation.it: Sei così carino, pelosetto e morbidoso…

translation.en: -It's him! Wake up! -Huh? Huh?
-Hey, boss! Boss! -Hey, boss!
-[short henchman] Boss! -The boy!
Impossible.
Okay, Din. You can do this.
Just tell her the truth.
-[elevator dings] -Good evening, sir.
-Oh, hey, Dan! -Hey!
-Sir, may I take your jacket? -My jacket? I just got this.
translation.it: - Posso prendere la sua giacca? - L'ho appena comprata.

translation.en: [chuckles] Good one, Dan.
[chuckles] Yeah, good one. Sure. I have plenty more of these at home.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Ne ho a bizzeffe a casa.

translation.en: -Thank you. Here you are. -Here.
Sorry about all the fuss. My dad insists on "only the best."
translation.it: Scusa per tutto questo. Mio padre vuole "solo il meglio".

translation.en: Actually, Li Na, there's something I need to tell you.
translation.it: In realtà, Li Na, devo dirti una cosa.

translation.en: I know what you're gonna say.
-You do? -Yes.
It's so nice to meet someone from a respectable family that you enjoy talking to, right?
translation.it: Una persona di una famiglia rispettabile con cui è bello parlare.

translation.en: -Oh. -Madame, your table is ready.
Right. Respectable.
Long, I'm supposed to be from a respectable family.
translation.it: Devo venire da una famiglia rispettabile.

translation.en: No. What? I'm shocked. I'm stunned.
translation.it: No! Cosa? Sono scioccato. Basito! È proprio come avevo previsto.

translation.en: -It's exactly what I predicted. -I need your help.
translation.it: No! Cosa? Sono scioccato. Basito! È proprio come avevo previsto. Devi aiutarmi.

translation.en: You were from royalty. Tell me what to do.
translation.it: Tu eri un re. Dimmi cosa fare.

translation.en: Fine. Do exactly what I say.
translation.it: Ma dovrai fare come ti dirò.

translation.en: -Okay. Deal. -Sir, could I offer you a hot tow--
You shouldn't let commoners talk to you.
translation.it: Non devi parlare con il volgo.

translation.en: -Really? -Sir, I just--
wanted to offer you a hot towel.
translation.it: Volevo… offrirle solo… un… panno… Signore…

translation.en: Sir, you just--
Madame, your table.
Demand another table, claiming it's far superior.
Li Na, this table simply won't do. Allow me to show you another one.
translation.it: Li Na, questo tavolo non va bene. Questo è di gran lunga migliore.

translation.en: This is the table for the hors d'oeuvres.
translation.it: È il tavolo per gli hors d'oeuvre.

translation.en: Well, you tell Mr. and Mrs. Hors D'oeuvres that this is our table.
translation.it: Dica ai signori Hors D'oeuvre che questo tavolo è nostro.

translation.en: Dan, you're such a funny guy.
[laughs] Funny? Uh, are you sure you didn't mean suave, classy, respectable.
translation.it: Divertente? Forse volevi dire: raffinato, rispettabile…

translation.en: You're too good. I'm gonna cry.
I would have her executed for mocking royalty.
I appreciate you trying to make this place interesting, but how about somewhere else?
translation.it: Vedo che provi a ravvivare il posto, ma perché non andiamo altrove?

translation.en: Somewhere else? Like more fancy than this?
translation.it: Altrove? In un locale più elegante?

translation.en: Not good enough? -Well played, child. -No, like, a walk or something.
translation.it: - Non ti basta? Molto bene. - Andiamo a fare una passeggiata.

translation.en: May I take your order?
-Spare no expense. Money's no object. -One of everything.
translation.it: - Non badare a spese. - Prendo tutto il menù.

translation.en: Sir, there are over 600 items on our menu.
-Better make that three. -Good!
As you wish, sir.
So, listen, Dan, about last night,
translation.it: Ascolta, Dan, riguardo a ieri sera,

translation.en: sorry for acting so weird.
translation.it: scusa se mi sono comportata così.

translation.en: To be honest, it's nice to have someone who listened.
translation.it: È bello avere qualcuno che mi ascolti.

translation.en: Ignore her and she's yours.
Look. Rich people never pay attention to anyone else.
translation.it: I ricchi non hanno riguardo per nessuno.

translation.en: All they talk about is their own business, how much money they make.
translation.it: Parlano solo dei loro affari e dei loro soldi.

translation.en: -It's almost an art form. -Are you listening to anything I said?
translation.it: - È quasi un'arte. - Hai sentito quello che ho detto?

translation.en: Not a word.
Um, okay, well, I was saying it was really nice to talk to you…
translation.it: Stavo dicendo che è bello parlare con te, perché…

translation.en: We're close, Din. Tell her how many palaces you own.
translation.it: Ci siamo. Dille quanti palazzi hai.

translation.en: Let me stop you. Did I tell you just how respectable my family is?
translation.it: Ti interrompo subito. Sai quanto è rispettabile la mia famiglia?

translation.en: -Your first entree. -Thanks. Uh-uh-uh.
For nothing.
Dan! You know what?
translation.it: Dan! Sai una cosa? Non sei chi credevo che fossi.

translation.en: -You're just not who I thought you were. -Wait, Li Na.
translation.it: Dan! Sai una cosa? Non sei chi credevo che fossi. Aspetta!

translation.en: I don't understand. That worked on all 17 of my wives.
translation.it: Con le mie 17 mogli ha funzionato.

translation.en: -I can explain. -What now?
I, uh…
We should…
We should go for that walk.
Maybe a run!
Bon appetit!
Surprise!
Hop on.
Fine.
Who were those men?
Gangsters. Probably out to kidnap us for a ransom.
-Come on. This way. -[exciting music playing]
You've always wanted to be in a street fight.
translation.it: Hai sempre voluto farlo, Li Na.

translation.en: -Help. -[Long] No!
-Stay calm. -[Din] Come on, please.
-Dan? -[Long groans]
Look what I found! [laughs]
[Long] Look at me. How did I become a piñata?
translation.it: Come ho fatto a ridurmi a una piñata?

translation.en: -I think we lost them. -Good.
So, when exactly were you going to apologize, Dan?
I…
The other way! Other way!
Li Na, I really do want to say I'm sorry.
translation.it: Li Na, voglio davvero chiederti scusa.

translation.en: Sorry for what exactly?
Sorry for acting like such a jerk.
Apology accepted.
Now, get him, Dan. Kick him right in his stupid face! Kick him!
translation.it: Ora attaccalo! Sparagli un calcio in faccia! Forza!

translation.en: Hand over the teapot, kid.
I didn't sign up for this. If you made your last wish, we-- Oh, no.
translation.it: Non era previsto. Se esprimessi l'ultimo… Oh, no.

translation.en: This literally could not get any wo--
-Good one. -Ah. Thanks. Eat metal, dirt bag!
How do you like them apples, huh?
Crap!
[Li Na] Incoming!
Trust me.
-Li Na, I think we're gonna have to-- -Jump!
Don't worry. We got this.
[Din] Oh, no!
[Li Na] Oh, my God!
You know what, Dan? This is turning into a pretty good date.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Questo appuntamento non è male.

translation.en: [Long] Oh, no!
-Are you okay? -I think so.
[Long] I'm fine. Thank you for asking.
Oh, boy.
What happened? Time's up, Dan.
What happened? Well, we jumped off a building. We almost died.
translation.it: Che succede? Siamo saltati da un palazzo. Siamo quasi morti.

translation.en: -Your 24 hours are over. -We beat up some gangsters.
translation.it: - Le 24 ore. - Abbiamo battuto i gangster.

translation.en: -No. -Okay, that was mostly you.
You gotta teach me some of that kung fu.
Reflexes.
Wait, what happened to your suit?
Look, Li Na.
There's… something I need to tell you. You have one more wish. You don't have to do this.
translation.it: - C'è una cosa che devo dirti. - Hai un altro desiderio. Non devi farlo.

translation.en: My real name isn't Dan. It's…
translation.it: Il mio vero nome non è Dan. È…

translation.en: [Li Na] Din.
You're Din.
I'm sorry.
But… why did you lie?
I wasn't planning to. I just…
I was worried that if you found out it was, well, just me,
translation.it: che, se avessi scoperto che ero… beh, soltanto Din, sarebbe finito tutto.

translation.en: everything would end.
translation.it: beh, soltanto Din, sarebbe finito tutto.

translation.en: So, you still live around here?
Yeah.
In that same old shikumen?
Yeah. I told you this wouldn't end well.
translation.it: - Sì. - L'avevo detto che sarebbe finita male.

translation.en: [Li Na] Wait.
I remember this alley.
We used to take a shortcut through here on the way home from school.
translation.it: La usavamo come scorciatoia per tornare da scuola.

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
And Mrs. Chu would sell those roasted yams.
translation.it: E la sig.ra Chu vendeva le patate arrosto.

translation.en: Hey, look at that! It's Mrs. Chu!
Hi, Mrs. Chu. It's Li Na Wang.
-Do you remember-- -One buck, two yams. No bargaining!
-Some things never change. -Here. [Mrs. Chu] Sold! Next. -Ow, ow. -[Mrs. Chu] Move!
translation.it: - Alcune cose non cambiano mai. - Venduta! Il prossimo. Spostatevi!

translation.en: So good!
Hold on, is that…
No way! [Li Na laughs]
Yeah, new decade, same sweatpants!
Hey, Din, what do you think about a little race?
translation.it: Che ne dici di fare una gara?

translation.en: -Three, two, one, go! -What? [Din] Hey!
translation.it: - Tre, due, uno, via! - Cosa? Ehi!

translation.en: Okay.
Not fair.
So, your old apartment has to be right around the corner.
translation.it: Il tuo vecchio appartamento dev'essere qui vicino.

translation.en: Oh, I don't know if that's such a good idea.
translation.it: Non so se sia una buona idea.

translation.en: -Hey Weijing, you have any green onions? -Hi, Mrs. Song.
translation.it: - Weijing, hai delle cipolle? - Salve, sig.ra Song.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do I know you?
Hey, Mom. So, uh, surprise!
We have an unexpected visitor.
A girl? That's why you're acting crazy?
translation.it: Una ragazza? Per questo ti comporti da pazzo?

translation.en: All this time worried you were drugged out in some internet cafe. It was a girl.
translation.it: Mamma, no! Io mi preoccupavo che ti stessi drogando e invece…

translation.en: -It's Li Na! -Just a--
Hi.
Li Na? What are you doing here?
translation.it: Li Na? Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: Just visiting an old friend.
translation.it: Faccio visita a un vecchio amico.

translation.en: [Mrs. Song grunts] Well, where are my manners? Come in.
You and I are not finished.
-She's so pretty now. -Like a princess.
Well, her nose is a little flat.
[Mrs. Song] Start with this.
-You really shouldn't go to-- -You're skinnier than a broom handle.
translation.it: - Non deve disturb… - Sei praticamente un osso!

translation.en: -I wasn't expecting-- -Li Na!
Did you know Din puts flowers on Clucky's grave every year?
translation.it: Sai che Din porta ancora i fiori alla tomba di Clucky!

translation.en: Mr. Huang, cut it out.
I did not know that.
He's so cute. He even cries a little.
I am not crying. I am mourning.
-He even brings flowers. -A tiny bouquet!
translation.it: - Porta anche i fiori. - Un bouquet!

translation.en: Come in.
What? You're saying that's not my son? You knew. Don't lie to me.
translation.it: - Quindi non è mio figlio? - Lo sapevi già. Non mentire.

translation.en: [man] You were lying to me this whole time.
You just wanted to inherit my dad's business.
translation.it: Volevi solo l'azienda di mio padre.

translation.en: -[woman] Right. I will. -I know what you did!
translation.it: - E l'avrò. - So cos'hai fatto! Credi di ingannarmi?

translation.en: You think you can fool me? I saw you with that guy.
translation.it: - E l'avrò. - So cos'hai fatto! Credi di ingannarmi? Ti ho visto con quello.

translation.en: [woman] You have no idea.
I should've listened to my mother.
translation.it: Dovevo dare retta a mia madre.

translation.en: -I am your mother. -No!
Here.
Oh, wow. Oh! It's like a time machine up here.
translation.it: - È come una macchina del tempo. - Sì, scusa.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. This is the only place I can get peace and quiet.
translation.it: - È come una macchina del tempo. - Sì, scusa. È l'unico posto dove posso stare in pace.

translation.en: [Li Na] You'll never have peace.
Because the ghost of Clucky will always haunt you!
translation.it: Il fantasma di Clucky ti perseguiterà!

translation.en: -[clucks] -No, Clucky! You're dead. Are you gonna cry? Are we gonna see tears now?
translation.it: - No, Clucky! Sei morto. - Ti metterai a piangere adesso?

translation.en: I regret nothing. You were delicious. You're gonna know what regret tastes like.
translation.it: - Niente rimpianti. Eri ottimo. - Ecco il sapore del rimpianto.

translation.en: Get away from me, you ghost chicken.
-Why did you eat me? -It was Li Na. She made me do it.
translation.it: - Perché mi hai mangiato? - È colpa di Li Na.

translation.en: Selling me out.
-That's cold. -It was your idea.
translation.it: - Non è carino. - Fu una tua idea.

translation.en: Yeah. I guess we had a lot of crazy ideas back then.
translation.it: Avevamo un sacco di idee pazzesche.

translation.en: Yeah.
Here.
Hey, do you remember that promise we made?
-The pinky-- -Of course!
How'd it go? Um…
Friends forever, day by…
[both] Year by year,
upon this we will always…
swear.
-God! -Are you okay?
I'm fine. I'm fine.
Sorry, I wasn't expecting my own giant face.
translation.it: Scusa, non mi aspettavo la mia faccia gigante.

translation.en: So embarrassing.
[chuckles] Don't be embarrassed. When I first saw that, I almost fell over.
translation.it: Anch'io sono quasi caduto quando l'ho vista.

translation.en: But it's been nice. Kind of like you were back.
translation.it: Ma è stato bello. Come se fossi tornata.

translation.en: But, you know, giant and glowing, and super glamorous.
translation.it: Solo… gigante, luminosa e super alla moda.

translation.en: Doesn't hold a candle to the real thing, though.
translation.it: Ma non regge il confronto con la realtà.

translation.en: What do you say we go for a real date? No Dan or any of that.
translation.it: Che ne dici di un appuntamento vero? Niente Dan o roba simile.

translation.en: I…
Sorry.
Where have you been? The shoot starts in an hour! What happened to your hair? I'm sending a car!
translation.it: Dov'eri? Il servizio è tra un'ora. Cos'hai fatto ai capelli? Mando l'autista!

translation.en: Din… I had a really wonderful time tonight,
translation.it: Din, mi sono divertita molto stasera,

translation.en: but I have to go.
-Thanks for letting me borrow this. -Keep it till next time.
translation.it: - Grazie per questo. - Me lo ridarai la prossima volta.

translation.en: No, really, I--
Not like I'm not gonna see you for another…
translation.it: Non è che non ti rivedrò più per altri…

translation.en: …ten years.
the truth is, I have this whole other life now.
translation.it: la verità è che adesso ho tutta un'altra vita.

translation.en: You know? A career.
A future that my dad worked really hard for.
translation.it: Un futuro per cui mio padre ha lavorato sodo.

translation.en: Certain expectations I have to meet.
Let me guess. I don't meet those expectations.
translation.it: Fammi indovinare: io non sono all'altezza di quelle aspettative.

translation.en: I…
You don't understand.
I… I'm just trying to be…
realistic.
I'm sorry.
Hey, Din.
Did you know that shrimp chips don't actually have any shrimp in the ingredients?
translation.it: Lo sapevi che le nuvole di gambero non contengono gamberi?

translation.en: Okay.
…things are simpler when you're children.
translation.it: Le cose sono più semplici quando si è bambini.

translation.en: But you're older now.
And, well,
you have to be realistic.
Good news, Long. You can finally be rid of me.
translation.it: Buone notizie. Finalmente puoi liberarti di me.

translation.en: I'm ready for my third wish. You are?
translation.it: - È ora del terzo desiderio. - Davvero?

translation.en: Make me rich. Piles of gold. However you do it.
translation.it: Rendimi ricco. Montagne d'oro. Quello che vuoi.

translation.en: -But-- -I thought it wouldn't matter.
That she wouldn't care.
That was stupid.
Give me the gold, and I can have some of that good life.
translation.it: Dammi l'oro e potrò vivere una buona vita.

translation.en: People will treat me with respect.
Heck, I'm sure everyone will want to be my friend then.
Din… [sighs]
Are you sure?
Am I sure? You've been telling me to make this wish since we met.
translation.it: Se sono sicuro? Mi offri questo desiderio dall'inizio.

translation.en: Well, you were right. Okay? I was wrong.
There you go, that's my wish. Just grant it, and you can go back to your spirit world
translation.it: Esaudisci il mio desiderio. Così tornerai nel mondo degli spiriti

translation.en: and your stupid parade in the sky.
Just grant the wish, Long.
What?
Din, I'll grant your wish.
But first, there's something I need to show you.
translation.it: Ma, prima, devo mostrarti una cosa.

translation.en: You found the boy. Where is he?
-At the Pearl Tower, sir. -Yeah, with a girl.
translation.it: - Era alla Pearl Tower. - Con una ragazza.

translation.en: -But I'm afraid he escaped again. -What? How?
Hey, that doesn't belong to you.
Listen to me. I am out of time. I need--
translation.it: Ascoltate. Non ho più tempo. Mi serve…

translation.en: -Li Na! Aren't you supposed to be at-- -I'm sorry, Dad. We really need to talk.
translation.it: - Li Na! Non dovevi essere a… - Scusa, papà. Dobbiamo parlare.

translation.en: Of course.
-I'm just on a very important call. -Dad. Please.
translation.it: - È una chiamata importante. - Papà. Ti prego.

translation.en: [bald man] Sir.
Do you remember when we lived in that old shikumen?
-I know we didn't have much but-- -Don't worry, Li Na.
translation.it: - Non avevamo molto, ma… - Non preoccuparti.

translation.en: We'll never go back to that life.
But, Dad, don't you ever miss those days?
translation.it: Ma non ti mancano quei tempi?

translation.en: Wha-- Where is all this coming from?
That… that young man last night, the one you arranged a date with,
translation.it: Il ragazzo con cui mi hai organizzato l'appuntamento

translation.en: that was Din.
From our old neighborhood? Yes.
And he's the one who took you to the Pearl Tower.
translation.it: E ti ha portato alla Pearl Tower.

translation.en: Yes, and I know what you'll say.
You'll tell me to stay away and to leave that old world behind,
translation.it: Di stargli lontano e lasciarmi tutto alle spalle,

translation.en: but the truth is, I think we might be happier if--
translation.it: ma credo che saremo più felici se…

translation.en: Li Na, everything's going to be all right. I'm gonna go talk with Din.
translation.it: Andrà tutto bene, Li Na. Parlerò io con Din.

translation.en: -What? -Bring the van in two minutes.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Ci vediamo tra due minuti.

translation.en: Dad, are you okay?
-What's going on? -Don't worry. I'm going to fix everything.
translation.it: - Che succede? - Non preoccuparti. Sistemerò tutto.

translation.en: Dad.
Where are you going?
What is this place?
-[Din] Whoa. -[Long] This was my home.
I was born into royalty.
translation.it: Ero un membro della famiglia reale. Sin da giovane, imparai che l'oro

translation.en: I learned from a young age that gold is power.
translation.it: Ero un membro della famiglia reale. Sin da giovane, imparai che l'oro è potere.

translation.en: So, I set my sights on expanding my fortune
translation.it: Mi impegnai per accrescere la mia ricchezza.

translation.en: and let nothing stand in my way.
My subjects were loyal…
…and worked tirelessly year after year.
translation.it: e lavoravano senza sosta, anno dopo anno.

translation.en: My daughters were married to the finest families,
translation.it: Le mie figlie sposarono uomini di famiglie ricche,

translation.en: to expand the kingdom's glory.
And my son, I sent off to win treasure.
translation.it: E mandai mio figlio a conquistare tesori.

translation.en: He came home a hero.
Soon, I had more gold, more land,
and more monuments than any lord who had come before me.
translation.it: e più monumenti di qualsiasi mio predecessore.

translation.en: And yet,
as I laid on my deathbed,
I awaited the parade of loyal subjects and loving family.
translation.it: aspettavo la parata di sudditi e familiari.

translation.en: But there was none.
With my last breath, I cursed all who had forgotten me.
translation.it: Maledissi coloro che mi avevano dimenticato.

translation.en: I arrived at the gates to the spirit world
translation.it: Arrivai al cancello del mondo degli spiriti,

translation.en: and awaited a great procession to welcome me.
I demand you open this!
Instead, the gods transformed me into a Wish Dragon.
translation.it: Ma gli dei mi trasformarono in un drago dei desideri.

translation.en: Not as a reward, but as a punishment.
translation.it: Non come ricompensa, ma come punizione.

translation.en: I was imprisoned and sent down to Earth
translation.it: Mi misero nella teiera e mi mandarono

translation.en: to serve ten masters and learn the true meaning of life.
translation.it: a servire dieci padroni e imparare il vero senso della vita.

translation.en: And to be honest, all these years,
translation.it: E, in realtà, in tutti questi anni,

translation.en: all these masters, I have been failing.
translation.it: con tutti questi padroni, ho fallito.

translation.en: Until I met you.
translation.it: Finché non ti ho incontrato. Non so il senso della vita.

translation.en: I don't know the meaning of life. But the things you care about,
translation.it: Finché non ti ho incontrato. Non so il senso della vita. Ma le cose che ami, i tuoi amici, la tua famiglia…

translation.en: your friends, your family,
translation.it: Ma le cose che ami, i tuoi amici, la tua famiglia…

translation.en: are worth more than anything I ever possessed.
translation.it: valgono più di qualsiasi mio bene.

translation.en: And no amount of gold can ever buy that.
translation.it: Ed è qualcosa che non ha prezzo.

translation.en: It's your wish, Din. Make sure it's what you really want.
translation.it: È il tuo desiderio. Assicurati che sia ciò che vuoi davvero.

translation.en: I…
Mr. Wang? What are you doing here?
translation.it: Signor Wang? Cosa ci fa qui?

translation.en: Please, give me that. I don't have time for any more games.
translation.it: Dammi la teiera. Non ho tempo per i giochetti.

translation.en: They work for you?
No one's going to get hurt, but I need those--
translation.it: Nessuno si farà male, ma mi servono…

translation.en: Stay away from my friend.
Finally, I'm saved.
What's wrong with you? I told you not to hurt the kid.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di non fare del male al ragazzo.

translation.en: I've been bowing to others my entire life.
translation.it: È tutta la vita che mi inchino davanti agli altri.

translation.en: And now, everyone will bow to me.
translation.it: Ora saranno gli altri a inchinarsi.

translation.en: No! No! No! No!
-Mr. Wang. -[bald man] Dragon, I summon you.
translation.it: - Signor Wang. - Drago, vieni a me.

translation.en: Din, Din! I'm your master now.
translation.it: - Din! - Sono io il tuo padrone.

translation.en: And I know my first wish.
[Li Na] Dad?
No! Oh, my God. What happened to you?
translation.it: No! Oh, mio Dio. Che ti è successo?

translation.en: -Din! -Get in the teapot.
Dad!
-Li Na. -No, no, no.
Call an ambulance! You're gonna be okay.
Li Na, listen to me.
I'm sorry.
I tried to save it, but the business is bankrupt.
translation.it: Ho provato a salvarla, ma l'azienda è in bancarotta.

translation.en: I wanted you to have everything.
And now, I've left you with nothing.
translation.it: E ora… - Ti ho lasciato senza niente. - No. Non mi serviva tutto quello.

translation.en: No. I never needed any of that.
translation.it: - Ti ho lasciato senza niente. - No. Non mi serviva tutto quello.

translation.en: All I ever wanted was my dad.
All I wanted was you.
One touch and you're done, kid.
Yeah, get him, boss. Touch him. Touch him good.
Ooh, sparks.
Long, I summon you.
Uh, dragon guy? I summon you.
Din! Din?
-[Din yells] -Din!
I wish for enough puppies to open a pet store.
translation.it: Desidero tanti cuccioli per aprire un negozio.

translation.en: Puppies?
Yes, puppies!
It shall be so!
Hey, little fella! I'll name you Teddy.
No, bad Teddy! Bad boy!
Hey, boss! I got the teapot!
Don't let the boy get it!
-Help us! Summon the dragon! -Wish for something! A gun, anything!
translation.it: Aiutaci! Chiama il drago! Desidera qualcosa! Una pistola!

translation.en: Wish? Dragon? Summon?
-Dragon guy. -Huh? I wish I had longer legs.
Um, okay.
Are you joking?
[both] I summon you!
I command you to throw this kid off.
I cannot intervene. You're not my master until you have sole possession.
translation.it: Non posso intervenire. Solo chi ha la teiera è il mio padrone.

translation.en: -Let it go. -No.
Let it go!
Long, Long, I can't see you!
There's no need to die tonight, kid. Come work for me.
translation.it: Non serve che tu muoia. Vieni a lavorare per me.

translation.en: I'll give you all the gold you want.
translation.it: Ti ricoprirò d'oro. Desideriamo entrambi la stessa cosa.

translation.en: -We're both wishing for the same thing. -No.
translation.it: Ti ricoprirò d'oro. Desideriamo entrambi la stessa cosa. No.

translation.en: No, we're not.
I don't need gold. I have something more important to wish for.
translation.it: Non mi serve l'oro. Ho un desiderio più importante.

translation.en: Din. I need that teapot.
Well, at least you'll make a good statue in my office.
translation.it: Almeno sarai una bella statua per l'ufficio.

translation.en: [muffled] Long!
What's happening?
Welcome, LongZhu.
-What's going on? Where am I? -Congratulations.
translation.it: - Benvenuto, LongZhu. - Che succede? - Dove sono? - Congratulazioni.

translation.en: Your service as a Wish Dragon is complete.
translation.it: Il tuo servizio come drago è terminato.

translation.en: Complete? I haven't finished. I haven't finished my tenth master.
translation.it: Cosa? Ma non ho finito. Mancava un desiderio.

translation.en: You have put the needs of another before yourself
translation.it: Hai messo i bisogni di un altro prima dei tuoi.

translation.en: and shown us that you understand the meaning of life.
translation.it: Hai compreso il senso della vita.

translation.en: You are now free to enter the spirit world.
translation.it: Ora puoi entrare nel mondo degli spiriti.

translation.en: Is that a…
parade?
In your honor.
No, I can't! I have to go back.
Back?
Turn me back into a Wish Dragon! I have one more wish to grant.
translation.it: Ritrasformami nel drago! Manca un desiderio.

translation.en: Ridiculous. The laws of heaven forbid it.
You're ridiculous! Old man in a skirt.
translation.it: Tu sei ridicolo con quella gonna!

translation.en: -This isn't a skirt! -Send me back!
translation.it: - Non è una gonna! - Mandami indietro!

translation.en: You dare reject the will of the gods?
translation.it: Osi rifiutare la volontà degli dei?

translation.en: Fine. If you're not gonna send me back, I'll go myself!
translation.it: Se non mi manderai indietro, ci tornerò da solo!

translation.en: -Stop that! -Stupid clouds.
Stop… stop that this instant! Ah! My friend needs me.
translation.it: - Smettila! - Il mio amico ha bisogno di me.

translation.en: Fine! We will permit you to return.
translation.it: E va bene! Ti permetteremo di tornare.

translation.en: But only under one condition.
Your final wish, great master.
I wish…
Dad? Dad!
There you are, Maurice. Here we got Pocket and Mr. Pants.
translation.it: Eccoti, Maurice. Qui ci sono Pocket e Mr. Pants.

translation.en: And all 234.
Wow, nice puppies.
Nice legs.
-Thanks. Toodles. -Bye!
Din, I…
When I said that you needed to be more realistic, I didn't mean that--
translation.it: Quando ti ho detto di essere più realista, non intendevo…

translation.en: It's okay, Mom.
I…
I'm sorry I can't give you a better life.
translation.it: Mi dispiace non poterti dare una vita migliore.

translation.en: You've given me a lot, Mom.
Everything that matters.
Well…
it's late and, uh, we should have dinner.
-Here. -[knocking at door]
Mr. Wang?
-What are you doing? -Is Din all right?
translation.it: - Che ci fate qui? - Din è qui? Sta bene?

translation.en: Din, what trouble have you started now? No, no. No trouble at all.
translation.it: - In che guai ti sei cacciato stavolta? - No, nessun guaio.

translation.en: I just came to apologize.
I know what you did.
Thank you.
Ah, well, where are my manners? Sit, sit, sit!
-We were about to have dinner. -You don't have to.
Nonsense. Nonsense. It's my pleasure.
And besides, we haven't had guests in, well, a couple hours!
translation.it: E poi, non abbiamo ospiti da almeno un paio d'ore!

translation.en: They're much too young to be holding hands.
translation.it: Sono troppo giovani per tenersi per mano.

translation.en: [all] Shut up!
Here, you look like you could use a good, home-cooked meal.
translation.it: Ecco. Direi che le serve proprio un pasto caldo.

translation.en: This is the most delicious soup I've ever tasted.
translation.it: È la zuppa più buona che abbia mai mangiato.

translation.en: [Mr. Wang] Na Na!
Na Na! Well, what do you think? It's too much, isn't it? I'll get another.
translation.it: Che ne pensi? È troppo, vero? Ne prendo un altro.

translation.en: It's great, Dad. Put it up in the front window.
-Yes! By tomorrow or no deal. -Hi.
Okay, hurry up with those dumplings. You, step aside.
Good job.
Din! Hello? Where are the teacups?
-We open in ten minutes. -I'm on it.
translation.it: - Apriamo tra 10 minuti. - Ci penso io.

translation.en: Teacups.
Teacups, teacups, teacups.
Greetings, great master.
Oh, a peasant child.
Long, what are you doing? You're supposed to be in the spirit world.
translation.it: Long! Che ci fai qui? Dovresti essere nel mondo degli spiriti.

translation.en: Yeah, uh, about that, uh, things got a little complicated.
translation.it: Sì, beh… Le cose si sono complicate un po'.

translation.en: So, I'm back!
Back? To serve another ten masters?
translation.it: Tornato? Per servire altri dieci padroni?

translation.en: You guessed it.
But, you've been waiting 1,000 years just to get through those gates.
translation.it: Ma hai aspettato mille anni per varcare quel cancello.

translation.en: I know, there was a parade and everything, but… you had one more wish.
translation.it: Lo so. C'era anche la parata, ma… Avevi un altro desiderio. Era l'unico modo.

translation.en: It was the only way.
translation.it: Avevi un altro desiderio. Era l'unico modo.

translation.en: You gave all that up for me?
translation.it: Hai rinunciato a tutto per me?

translation.en: This is what I want.
For the first time, it feels like I have a little wisdom to offer.
translation.it: Per la prima volta, sento di avere della saggezza da offrire,

translation.en: Maybe make a difference down here.
Besides, there are no shrimp chips there, and I still haven't ridden in one of those metal birds,
translation.it: Lassù non ci sono nuvole di gambero e voglio salire su un uccello di metallo…

translation.en: and no air conditioning. No air conditioning in heaven!
translation.it: E non c'è l'aria condizionata in paradiso!

translation.en: There's actually plenty of--
Thank you, Long.
Thank you.
Din, why is there a pile of broken teacups in the--
translation.it: Din, cosa sono queste tazze rotte…

translation.en: Know what? I don't want to know.
Okay, Din, let go.
Let go, Din.
See you soon, Long.
I am a god.
What are you looking at? A god, that's what.
translation.it: Che cosa guardi? Un dio, ecco cosa!
